alert.note: Alert for Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 5:06PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Clay County through 545 PM EDT... At 506 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Oakleaf Plantation, or 7 miles west of Orange Park, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oakleaf Plantation, Doctors Inlet, Lakeside and Bellair-Meadowbrook Terrace. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
